ygData.subject: Re: WAHOO!!
ygData.msgSnippet: Cool deal!!  If you end up on Xev, give me a holla--- Xela or Rumbl. If you need help moving in, send airfare via paypal-- hahahaha... See ya!! ... happen ...
ygData.messageBody:
Cool deal!! If you end up on Xev, give me a holla--- Xela or Rumbl.
If you need help moving in, send airfare via paypal-- hahahaha...

See ya!!


--- In theeverquesttavern@y..., ravens_sorrows <no_reply@y...> wrote:
> Well it seems that my dreams of actually playinf EQ again may
happen
> a lot sooner than I had expected! I finally got the money I was
> waiting for so I put my deposit down for the on-campus apartments.
It
> seems that there may be an opening by the end of this month if I
want
> it. (Yah like that's a question to ask me! Do I want it?! Yup you
> betcha!) So keep your fingers crossed that I can actually move on
> campus by the end of this month cause if I do...well...I'll be
> playing by the middle of next month. *sigh* the last few weeks are
> the hardest to wait for! The Raven
